Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits businesses from charging a price for services on the basis of gender
Summary: Prohibits any business from charging a price for services of a substantially similar or like kind on the basis of a person's gender.
LawCode: Add ยง391-u, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting businesses from charging a price for services on the basis of gender
